for (var i = 0; i < {MARKER_NAME}.length; i++) { var marker = new google.maps.Marker({ 'position': new google.maps.LatLng({MARKER_NAME}[i].LATITUDE, {MARKER_NAME}[i].LONGITUDE), 'ID': {MARKER_NAME}[i].ID, 'TYPE': '{type}', }); google.maps.event.addListener(marker, 'mouseover', function() { var me = this; getContent('singlemarker', this, function(content) { setMapInfo(content, me); }); }); markers.push(marker); }
